qas.question: ho sang a version of Queen's Somebody to Love in 2004's Ella Enchanted?
Which actress recorded a Queen song for 2006's Happy Feet?
Which movie featured a cover of Queen's The Show Must Go On?
Which film had Robbie Williams performing a cover of Queen's We Are the Champions?

context: Several films have featured their songs performed by other artists. A version of "Somebody to Love" by <a0_0>Anne Hathaway<a0_0/> was in the 2004 film Ella Enchanted. In 2006, <a1_0>Brittany Murphy<a1_0/> also recorded a cover of the same song for the 2006 film Happy Feet. In 2001, a version of "The Show Must Go On" was performed by Jim Broadbent and Nicole Kidman in the film musical <a2_0>Moulin Rouge!<a2_0/>. The 2001 film <a3_0>A Knight's Tale<a3_0/> has a version of "We Are the Champions" performed by Robbie Williams and Queen; the film also features "We Will Rock You" played by the medieval audience.
